original_text: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
korean_text: 또 나를 위하여 구할 것은 내게 말씀을 주사 나로 입을 열어 복음의 비밀을 담대히 알리게 하옵소서 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: that utterance may be given unto me,
that I may open my mouth boldly,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 담대히 내 입을 열게 하옵소서,

sentences.original_text: to make known the mystery of the gospel,
